title: Failure and Betrayal (with Tobias Ellwood MP)
itunes:title: Failure and Betrayal (with Tobias Ellwood MP)
description:
The takeover by the Taliban in Afghanistan has brought to a chaotic end 20 years of military and financial effort to rebuild that country by the U.S., Britain and their allies.

Tobias Ellwood, Conservative MP for Bournemouth East and chair of the Defence Select Committee, tells Bloomberg Westminster's Caroline Hepker and Roger Hearing that Washington and London had both made the schoolboy error of not staying the course when things got difficult.

Oksana Pyzik, senior teaching fellow at University College London, joins to discuss the likely course of the pandemic in the U.K. as the rules on self-isolation change in England. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
